title: Antimacassar, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: patchwork of techniques, including needlework on knotted net,  bobbin and needle lace
dimensions: H x W (includes tassels): 51 x 45.5 cm (20 1/16 x 17 15/16 in.)
description: Heraldic device of fleur-de-lis, shield and flowering tree within a large diamond. Upper portion of diamond is set into a panel. Tassels at the pointed ends.

tombstone.epitaph:
Antimacassar, early 20th century.Medium: linen
